summary: I changed only armor rating of Guild Master\'s Armor and made heavy armor.I don\'t like hoods or helmets so i didn\'t change hood\'s stats but total armor rating of armor,boots and gauntlets is like  total rating of daedric armor,boots,gauntlets and HELMET !
descriptionHtml:
English

I changed only armor rating of Guild Master\'s Armor and made heavy armor.I don\'t like hoods or helmets so i didn\'t change hood\'s stats but total armor rating of armor,boots and gauntlets is like  total rating of daedric armor,boots,gauntlets and HELMET !
That is my first mod for SKYRIM 

You can add armor with code:

Thieves Guild Master\'s Boots 	000D3ACB		
Thieves Guild Master\'s Armor 	000D3ACC		
Thieves Guild Master\'s Gloves	000D3ACD

This mod is a replacer but you can easily uninstall the mod.

And i can recommend you a mod by Isilmeriel. It\'s a LOTR Weapon mod and look awesome!
 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5727

ENJOY !!!

......................................................................................................................................

TURKISH

Selam arkada?lar bu benim skyrim için ilk modum asl?nda mod bile denemez sadece Guild Master\'s
Armor\'? heavy armora çevirdim ama hood\'u çevirmedim çünkü Hoodlardan veya Helmetlerden ho?lanm?yorum ama zaten z?rh,bot ve eldivenin toplam korumas? daeric armor?n z?rh,eldiven,bot ve helmetinin toplam korumas?na yak?n bir koruma sa?l?yor.

Bu mod eski z?rh? de?i?tirmektedir ama modu kolayl?ka kald?rarak eskisinide kullanabilirsiniz.

Ayr?ca en be?endi?im silah modunuda sizlerle payla?mak istedim: Isilmeriel LOTR Weapons Collection    http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5727

Z?rh? hile ile de edinebilirsiniz:

Thieves Guild Master\'s Boots 	000D3ACB		
Thieves Guild Master\'s Armor 	000D3ACC		
Thieves Guild Master\'s Gloves	000D3ACD

?yi e?lenceler !!!
author: yusuf1604
